title: And I thought it was the protection scheme
author: VD
content_html:
Peter King lauds the NFL’s choke artiste supreme:

I think I applaud Peyton Manning’s selection as the NFL Walter Payton Man of the Year…. The best thing he said this morning at his news conference was about the advice he often gives kids: “Take 10 seconds and think: What is the right thing to do?” he said.

Well, no wonder he kept getting sacked by Pittsburgh.
content_text:
Peter King lauds the NFL’s choke artiste supreme:
I think I applaud Peyton Manning’s selection as the NFL Walter Payton Man of the Year….  The best thing he said this morning at his news conference was about the advice he often gives kids: “Take 10 seconds and think: What is the right thing to do?” he said.
